carousel.style: .sf-recomm-section{ padding-bottom: 50px; } .sf-container { --sf-gutter-x: 1rem; --sf-gutter-y: 0; width: 100%; padding-right: calc(var(--bs-gutter-x) * .5); padding-left: calc(var(--bs-gutter-x) * .5); margin-right: auto; margin-left: auto; } .sf-container * { box-sizing: border-box; } .sf-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; margin-top: calc(-1 * var(--sf-gutter-y)); margin-right: calc(-.5 * var(--sf-gutter-x)); margin-left: calc(-.5 * var(--sf-gutter-x)); } .sf-equal-height [class*="sf-col-"] { display: flex; flex-direction: column; } .sf-row>* { flex-shrink: 0; width: 100%; max-width: 100%; padding-right: calc(var(--sf-gutter-x) * .5); padding-left: calc(var(--sf-gutter-x) * .5); margin-top: var(--sf-gutter-y); } .sf-col { flex: 1 0 0%; } .sf-col-1 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 8.33333333%; } .sf-col-2 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 16.66666667%; } .sf-col-3 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 25%; } .sf-col-4 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 33.33333333%; } .sf-col-5 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 41.66666667%; } .sf-col-6 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 50%; } .sf-col-7 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 58.33333333%; } .sf-col-8 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 66.66666667%; } .sf-col-9 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 75%; } .sf-col-10 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 83.33333333%; } .sf-col-11 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 91.66666667%; } .sf-col-12 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 100%; } .sf-flex { display: flex; } .sf-flex-column { flex-direction: column; } .sf-align-center { align-items: center; } .sf-self-align-end { justify-content: start; align-content: flex-end; } .sf-text-center{ text-align: center !important; } .sf-widget-title { width: 100%; margin-top: unset; line-height: 1.5; text-align: center; font-weight: 700; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-size: 28px; font-family: unset; font-weight: 700; text-align: center; padding-bottom: 20px; } .sf-slider .sf-product-item { height: auto !important; } .sf-product-image { transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out; width: 100%; height: 100%; margin: 0 auto; object-fit: contain; aspect-ratio: 1; } .sf-product-title { margin-bottom: 5px; color: #000000; word-wrap: break-word; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; line-height: 1.5; } .sf-price-container { line-height: 1.5; } .sf-product-price { color: #000000; margin-bottom: 5px } .sf-product-offer-price { color: red; margin-bottom: 10px } .sf-add-to-cart-btn { display: none; align-items: center; border: none; background: #000000; font-size: 14px; width: 100%; min-height: 32px; outline: none; padding: 8px 8px; overflow-wrap: break-word; position: relative; text-align: center; justify-content: center; cursor: pointer; min-width: 40px; line-height: 1.2; color: #ffffff; border-radius:3px; }.sf-out-of-stock { display: none ; align-items: center; border: none; background: #000000; font-size: 14px; width: 100%; min-height: 32px; outline: none; padding: 8px 8px; overflow-wrap: break-word; position: relative; text-align: center; justify-content: center; cursor: pointer; min-width: 40px; line-height: 1.2; background-color: grey !important; color: white !important; cursor: not-allowed !important; animation: none !important; border-radius: 3px; } .sf-product-variants-dropdown { background-image: none !important; font-family: inherit; cursor: pointer; display: none; width: 100%; height: 32px; color: #000; border: 1px solid; background: transparent; padding: 0 18px 0 8px; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; font-weight: 400; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; box-sizing: none; border-color: rgb(233, 235, 236); color: rgb(35, 35, 35); margin-top: 15px; border-radius: 6px; } .sf-cart-container { margin: 15px 0px 0px; } .sf-product-variants-dropdown option { padding: 5px; } .sf-product-link { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; overflow: hidden; } .sf-brand-container{ display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; margin-top: 15px; } .sf-brand-container a{ text-decoration: none; color: #6d7175 } .sf-brand-content{ font-weight: 600; } .sf-select-btn { display: flex; align-items: center; border: none; background: #000000; font-size: 14px; width: 100%; min-height: 32px; outline: none; padding: 8px 8px; overflow-wrap: break-word; position: relative; text-align: center; justify-content: center; cursor: pointer; min-width: 40px; line-height: 1.2; color: #ffffff; border-radius:3px;}

margin-left: calc(-.5 * var(--sf-gutter-x)); } .sf-row>* { flex-shrink: 0; width: 100%; max-width: 100%; padding-right: calc(var(--sf-gutter-x) * .5); padding-left: calc(var(--sf-gutter-x) * .5); margin-top: var(--sf-gutter-y); } .sf-col { flex: 1 0 0%; } .sf-col-1 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 8.33333333%; } .sf-col-2 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 16.66666667%; } .sf-col-3 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 25%; } .sf-col-4 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 33.33333333%; } .sf-col-5 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 41.66666667%; } .sf-col-6 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 50%; } .sf-col-7 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 58.33333333%; } .sf-col-8 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 66.66666667%; } .sf-col-9 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 75%; } .sf-col-10 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 83.33333333%; } .sf-col-11 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 91.66666667%; } .sf-col-12 { flex: 0 0 auto; width: 100%; } .sf-flex { display: flex; } .sf-flex-column { flex-direction: column; } .sf-align-center { align-items: center; } .sf-product-list { max-width: 420px; } .sf-product-list > .sf-product-item:not(:last-child) { margin-bottom: 20px; } .sf-product-image-container { position: relative; overflow: hidden; height: 100%; cursor: pointer; font-size: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } .sf-widget-title { width: 100%; margin-top: unset; line-height: 1.5; text-align: center; font-weight: 700; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-size: 28px; font-family: unset; font-weight: 700; text-align: center; padding-bottom: 20px; } .sf-product-image { transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out; width: 100%; height: 100%; margin: 0 auto; object-fit: cover; } .sf-product-title { line-height: 1.5; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; cursor: pointer; word-break: break-all; } .sf-product-price { color: #000000; margin-bottom: 5px } .sf-product-offer-price { color: red; margin-bottom: 10px } .sf-add-to-cart-btn { display: none; align-items: center; border: none; background: #000000; font-size: 14px; width: 100%; min-height: 32px; outline: none; padding: 8px 8px; overflow-wrap: break-word; position: relative; text-align: center; justify-content: center; cursor: pointer; min-width: 40px; line-height: 1.2; color: #ffffff; border-radius:3px; } .sf-out-of-stock { display: none ; align-items: center; border: none; background: #000000; font-size: 14px; width: 100%; min-height: 32px; outline: none; padding: 8px 8px; overflow-wrap: break-word; position: relative; text-align: center; justify-content: center; cursor: pointer; min-width: 40px; line-height: 1.2; background-color: grey !important; color: white !important; cursor: not-allowed !important; animation: none !important; border-radius: 3px; } .sf-product-variants-dropdown { background-image: none !important; font-family: inherit; cursor: pointer; display: none; width: 100%; height: 32px; color: #000; border: 1px solid; background: transparent; padding: 0 18px 0 8px; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; font-weight: 400; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; box-sizing: none; border-color: rgb(233, 235, 236); color: rgb(35, 35, 35); margin-top: 10px; border-radius: 6px; } .sf-cart-container { margin: 15px 0px 0px; } .sf-product-variants-dropdown option { padding: 5px; } .sf-product-link { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; overflow: hidden; } .sf-brand-container-list{ display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: flex-start; margin-top: 15px; margin-left: 130px; } .sf-brand-container-list a{ text-decoration: none; color: #6d7175 } .sf-brand-content{ font-weight: 600; } .sf-select-btn { display: flex; align-items: center; border: none; background: #000000; font-size: 14px; width: 100%; min-height: 32px; outline: none; padding: 8px 8px; overflow-wrap: break-word; position: relative; text-align: center; justify-content: center; cursor: pointer; min-width: 40px; line-height: 1.2; color: #ffffff; border-radius:3px;}
